key_items: The fish with black stripes directly supports the option by being the subject of the action (pressing the gills). Its presence is necessary to understand the context of the action being performed. Removing this entity would change the conclusion as it would not be clear what fish's gills are being pressed.-  The small fish directly support the options by being the intended result of the action (encouraging them to exit the mouth of the fish with black stripes). Their presence is crucial to understanding the purpose of the action. Removing this entity would change the conclusion as it would not be clear what the action is intended to achieve.
